title: Ticket #7205: starter does not exit with DPRINTF_ERROR if StarterLog owned by root
description: CHTC managed to get a bunch of StarterLog.slot1_xx owned by root. The starter excepts on startup in this case, but with a normal EXCEPT, and doesn't exit with exit code 44 (DPRINTF_ERROR), which would make debugging this much, much easier.
creator: gthain
